name: Sonoran Flats Solar Farm — 400 MW
description: 400 MW DC single-axis tracker solar farm on 2800 acres in Maricopa County. 25-year PPA with APS at $24/MWh

name: Silver Bell Solar + Storage — 250 MW / 1 GWh
description: 250 MW solar + 250 MW / 1 GWh 4-hour BESS co-located in Pima County. PPA with TEP

name: Mojave Gateway Solar — 350 MW
description: 350 MW utility-scale solar on BLM land in Clark County NV. 20-year PPA with NV Energy

name: Lone Star Solar I — 200 MW
description: 200 MW single-axis tracker solar in Pecos County TX. ERCOT merchant + Microsoft PPA hedge

name: Palmetto Sun Solar — 180 MW
description: 180 MW solar farm in Lancaster County SC. 15-year PPA with Duke Energy Carolinas

name: Great Plains Wind Farm — 500 MW
description: 500 MW onshore wind farm in Ellis County KS. 72 Vestas V162-6.2 MW turbines. SPP interconnection

name: Prairie Ridge Wind — 300 MW
description: 300 MW onshore wind farm in McLean County IL. 48 Vestas V162. MISO interconnection + Amazon PPA

name: Alberta Chinook Wind — 200 MW
description: 200 MW wind farm in Pincher Creek area Alberta. 32 Vestas V162. AESO capacity market contract

name: SunLink 345kV Transmission — AZ-NV
description: 85-mile 345kV double-circuit transmission line from Pinal County AZ to Clark County NV with 2 substations

name: Phoenix Grid Battery — 200 MW / 800 MWh
description: 200 MW / 800 MWh standalone BESS at SRP Santan substation. 4-hour LFP system for peak shaving and ancillary

name: Sonora Solar I — 300 MW
description: 300 MW solar farm in Puerto Libertad Sonora Mexico. CFE 20-year PPA in MXN

name: Ontario Solar Pipeline — 500 MW (Development)
description: Development of 500 MW solar portfolio across 4 sites in southern Ontario. Permitting and interconnection phase
